owl:Class.rdfs:label: article
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: One of the types of resources

owl:Class.rdfs:label: book
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: One of the types of resources

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Booklet
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: One of the types of resources

owl:Class.rdfs:label: chapter
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This class represents a chapter
owl:Class.dc:description: This class is to be moved to JeromeDL's structure ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cluster
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Represent a concept of cluster - subunit of Institute

owl:Class.rdfs:label: collection
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Represents collection of resources.
owl:Class.dc:description: This class represents a collection of resources (articles, books, etc). It describes the hierarchy of reaources/collections and allows to represent collections of articles or article as a collection

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Conference
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: One of the types of resources

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Copyrights
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This class represents the copyrights entity.
owl:Class.dc:description: This class is the range of hasCopyrights property.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: coverage
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This class represents the range of the "coverage" annotation property from dc.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Faculty
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Represents a concept of a faculty - subunit of university.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Inbook
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: One of the types of resources

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Incollection
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: One of the types of resources

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Inproceedings
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: One of the types of resources

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Institute
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Represents the concept of Institute.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Journal
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Represent the journal entity.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Laboratory
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Represents a concept ot Laboratory - subunit of cluster.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Manual
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: One of the types of resources

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Mastersthesis
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: One of the types of resources

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Misc
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: One of the types of resources

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Description
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This class represents the enumeration type encapsulating all the values appropriate for moths.
owl:Class.dc:description: This class is an enumeration type describing 3-letter representations of names of the months according to bibtex specification.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Organization
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Represent the concept of organization
Equivalent to foaf:Person

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Phdthesis
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: One of the types of resources

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Proceedings
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: One of the types of resources

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Project
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Represents the concept of project.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: referable entity
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This class represents an entity that can be referrenced.
owl:Class.dc:description: This class is to be moved to JeromeDL's structure ontology

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Resource
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Base class for all bibliographical resources.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Structure element
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This class represents the structural element of a bibliographic resource.
owl:Class.dc:description: This class is to be moved to JeromeDL's structure ontology

owl:Class.rdfs:label: table of contents
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This class represents a table of contents
owl:Class.dc:description: This class is to be moved to the JeromeDL's structure ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Techreport
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: One of the types of resources

owl:Class.rdfs:label: University
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This class represents the university concept

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Unpublished
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: One of the types of resourcesÂ

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has creator
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Property used to describe the creator of the resource or the collection of resources.
owl:ObjectProperty.dc:description: This property can be used to describe the creator of a givven resource or of the given collection of resources. It can be either a person, a group ar an organisation.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Affiliation of a given person.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has affiliation
has Author
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property allows to attach information about human author of the resource or the collection of resources.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has chapter
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Describes chapters of the resource (book, article etc).
Used to identify table of contents (TOC)
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has table of contents

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: An entity responsible for making contributions to the content of the resource but not the author.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has contributor
has copyright
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property attaches copyrights to a given resource.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has coverage
owl:ObjectProperty.dc:description: This property is equivalent to dc:coverage. Coverage will typically include spatial location (a place name or geographic coordinates), temporal period (a period label, date, or date range) or jurisdiction (such as a named administrative entity). Recommended best practice is to select a value from a controlled vocabulary (for example, the Thesaurus of Geographic Names [TGN]) and that, where appropriate, named places or time periods be used in preference to numeric identifiers such as sets of coordinates or date ranges.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The extent or scope of the content of the resource.
equivalent to bobtex:hasCrossRef property.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has cross reference
owl:ObjectProperty.dc:description: The key of the entry being cross referenced.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Describes the domain of interest appropriate for the resource.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has domain of interest

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Defines the editor of a given resource or collection of resources.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Editor
has human creator
owl:ObjectProperty.dc:description: This property can be used to describe the human creator (a person) of a givven resource or of the given collection of resources.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Property used to describe the creator of the resource or the collection of resources.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has journal
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A journal name. Abbreviations are provided for many journals; see the Local Guide

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has label
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The month in which the work was published or, for an unpublished work, in which it was written. You should use the standard three-letter abbreviation.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has organization
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The organization that is involved in the event.
owl:ObjectProperty.dc:description: This property is equivalent to bibtex:hasOrganization property.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasOwner
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Represents the owner of the copyright.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has publisher
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Describes publisher of a given resource.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has school
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: University where the work was created/published

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has source
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Property equivalent to dc:source property.
Sponsor of the Resource or the event.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has sponsor.
has topic
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Topic of the resource.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has URL
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: URI of the DCMI type or the resource.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has address
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Usually the address of the publisher or other type of institution. For major publishing houses, van Leunen recommends omitting the information entirely. For small publishers, on the other hand, you can help the reader by giving the complete address.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has begin date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Begin date of the copyright period.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has edition
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The edition of a book--for example, "Second". This should be an ordinal, and should have the first letter capitalized, as shown here; the standard styles convert to lower case when necessary.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has identifier
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: This proprerty represents the identifier property.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has ISBN
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: This property allows to assign an identifier in the form of ISBN

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has ISSN
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Represents the ISSN number assigned to a given resource

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has note
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Any additional information that can help the reader.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has number
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The number of a journal, magazine, technical report, or of a work in a series. An issue of a journal or magazine is usually identified by its volume and number; the organization that issues a technical report usually gives it a number; and sometimes books are given numbers in a named series.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has order
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Refers to the order of resources in Jerome Digital Library. Each resource is given a number to allow control over thier order.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has pages
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Nu,ber of pages of the resource or chapter.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has series
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The name of a series or set of books. When citing an entire book, the the title field gives its title and an optional series field gives the name of a series or multi-volume set in which the book is published.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has volume
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The volume of a journal or multivolume book.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has year
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The year of publication or, for an unpublished work, the year it was written. Generally it should consist of four numerals, such as 1984.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: how published
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: How something strange has been published. The first word should be capitalized.

owl:TransitiveProperty.rdfs:label: is part of
owl:TransitiveProperty.rdfs:comment: represents a is-part-of realation between elements that belong to a collection or between collections.

owl:Restriction.rdfs:label: has month range
owl:Restriction.rdfs:comment: This entity represents the enumeration describing accepted values of hasMonth property
